actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act, as amended, to define the term "navigable waters" as it applies to the Corps of Engineers' responsibility and authority to regulate the discharge of dredged or fill material.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to further define the term "navigable waters" as it applies to the issuance of permits for dredged or fill material by the Corps of Engineers.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act, as amended, to define the term "navigable waters" as it applies to the Corps of Engineers' responsibility and authority to regulate the discharge of dredged or fill material.
